headline: Franklin Resources (BEN): The Best Dividend Aristocrat Stock with Over 3% Yield
summary: We recently published a list of the 15 Best Dividend Aristocrat Stocks with Over 3% Yield. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) stands against other best dividend aristocrats with a high yield. Dividend Aristocrats are the companies that have raised their payouts for 25 consecutive […]
